entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High plus 2.
